Name: ActionBar-PullToRefresh
Short Description: ActionBar-PullToRefresh provides an easy way to add a modern version of the pull-to-refresh interaction to your application.
Author: chrisbanes

Name: Android Asset Studio
Short Description: Excellent community tools to generate custom graphics for Actionbars , UI controls and icons.
Author: Community

Name: Android Asynchronous Http Client
Short Description: An asynchronous callback-based Http client for Android built on top of Apache’s HttpClient libraries. All requests are made outside of your app’s main UI thread, but any callback logic will be executed on the same thread as the callback was created using Android’s Handler message passing.
Author: loopj

Name: android-iconify
Short Description: Integration of FontAwesome for Android
Author: JoanZapata

Name: android-menudrawer
Short Description: A slide-out menu implementation, which allows users to navigate between views in your app. Most commonly the menu is revealed by either dragging the edge of the screen, or clicking the 'up' button in the action bar.
Author: SimonTV

Name: android-sqllite-asset-helper
Short Description:
An Android helper class to manage database creation and version management using an application's raw asset files.

This class provides developers with a simple way to ship their Android app with an existing SQLite database (which may be pre-populated with data) and to manage its initial creation and any upgrades required with subsequent version releases.
Author: jgilfelt

Name: android-stackblur
Short Description: Android StackBlur is a library that can perform a blurry effect on a Bitmap based on a gradient or radius, and return the result. The library is based on the code of Mario Klingemann.
Author: kikoso

Name: android-styled-dialogs
Short Description: This library makes styling and using dialogs a piece of cake.
Author: inmite

Name: Android-SwipeToDismiss
Short Description: Sample code that shows how to make ListView or other views support the swipe-to-dismiss Android UI pattern.
Author: romannurik

Name: Android-Universal-Image-Loader
Short Description: Powerful and flexible library for loading, caching and displaying images on Android.
Author: nostra13

Name: Android-ViewPagerIndicator
Short Description: Paging indicator widgets that are compatible with the ViewPager from the Android Support Library to improve discoverability of content.
Author: JakeWharton

Name: Android-Wheel-Menu
Short Description: A wheel menu for android
Author: anupcowkur

Name: AndroidDrawableFactory
Short Description: A Java Application to create appropriate Drawable resources for your Android application
Author: tizionario

Name: AndroidFaceCropper
Short Description: A library for cropping faces out of a bitmap and ImageViews.
Author: lafosca

Name: AndroidFloatLabel
Short Description: Textview that implements the floating label pattern.
Author: weddingparty

Name: androidicons-adt-template
Short Description: Android Studio / Eclipse ADT template for androidicons.com resources
Author: jgilfelt

Name: AndroidSlidingUpPanel
Short Description: The 2.2 version of the Umano Android app features a sexy sliding up draggable panel for the currently playing article. This type of a panel is a common pattern also used in the Google Music app and the Rdio app. This is an open source implementation of this component that you are free to take advantage of in your apps.
Author: umano

Name: AndroidStaggeredGrid
Short Description: An Android staggered grid view which supports multiple columns with rows of varying sizes.
Author: etsy

Name: AnimatedExpandableListView
Short Description:
An extendable, flexible ExpandableListView widget that supports animations.

This project is dedicated to J Withey for giving me the motivation to write and release this source.
Author: idunnololz

Name: Application Crash Reports for Android
Short Description: ACRA is a library enabling Android Application to automatically post their crash reports to a GoogleDoc form. It is targetted to android applications developers to help them get data from their applications when they crash or behave erroneously.
Author: ACRA

Name: Bugsense
Short Description:
BugSense is the leading developer tool to help you manage the Android fragmentation.

Lightweight
Proguard integration
ACRA
Capture LogCat
Maven / Gradle
Author: Bugsense

Name: butterknife
Short Description: View "injection" library for Android.
Author: JakeWharton

Name: butterknife-zelezny
Short Description: Android Studio plug-in for generating ButterKnife injections from selected layout XML.
Author: inmite

Name: Caldroid
Short Description: Caldroid is a fragment that display calendar with dates in a month. Caldroid can be used as embedded fragment, or as dialog fragment. User can also swipe left/right to navigate to different months.
Author: roomorama

Name: Calligraphy
Short Description: Custom fonts in Android the easy way.
Author: chrisjenx

Name: cardsui
Short Description: An open source library offering the popular Google Now & Google Play cards views, additionnal features, view recycling and an optional Model-View-Controller structure.
Author: nadavfima

Name: Crouton
Short Description:
Crouton is a class that can be used by Android developers that feel the need for an alternative to the Context insensitive Toast.
A Crouton will be displayed at the position the developer decides. Standard will be the top of an application window. You can line up multiple Croutons for display, that will be shown one after another.
Author: keyboardsurfer

Name: cwac-endless
Short Description:
AJAX Web sites have sometimes taken up the "endless page" model, where scrolling automatically loads in new content, so you never have to click a "Next" link or anything like that.

EndlessAdapter is one approach to solving this problem.

It is designed to wrap around another adapter, where you have your "real" data. Hence, it follows the Decorator pattern, augmenting your current adapter with new Endless Technology(TM).
Author: commonsguy

Name: dagger
Short Description: A fast dependency injector for Android and Java.
Author: square

Name: DebugLog
Short Description: Create a simple and more understandable Android logs.
Author: MustafaFerhan

Name: discreet-app-rate
Short Description: A lightweight non intrusive app rate reminder for Android
Author: PomepuyN

Name: DobSliding
Short Description: DobSliding is an Open Source Android library that allows developers to develop applications with vertical sliding menus just like the Android notifications menu.
Author: Startappz

Name: DraggablePanel
Short Description: Android library used to create an awesome Android UI based on a draggable element similar to the last YouTube graphic component.
Author: pedrovgs

Name: easy-adapter
Short Description: Using AdapterViews has never been so easy. Inspired by the view holder design pattern, this library provides an easier way of linking AdapterViews and the underlying data for that view without having to implement your own Adapter. The EasyAdapter will do the tedious work for you.
Author: ribot

Name: EventBus
Short Description: Android optimized event bus that simplifies communication between Activities, Fragments, Threads, Services, etc. Less code, better quality.
Author: greenrobot

Name: Fading ActionBar
Short Description: Android library implementing a fading effect for the action bar, similar to the one found in the Play Music app
Author: ManuelPeinado

Name: FlipView
Short Description: A small, easy to use android library for implementing flipping between views as seen in the popular Flipboard application
Author: emilsjolander

Name: flow
Short Description: A small library that helps with describing an app as a collection of moderately independent screens.
Author: square

Name: FreeFlow
Short Description: A layout engine for Android that decouples layouts from the View containers that manage scrolling and view recycling. FreeFlow makes it really easy to create custom layouts and beautiful transition animations as layouts are changed.
Author: Comcast

Name: Genymotion
Short Description:
Genymotion is the next generation of the AndroVM open source project, already trusted by 900,000 developers.

It’s even easier to use and has lots more functionalitie
Author: Genymotion

Name: Glide
Short Description: Glide is fast and efficient image loading library for Android that wraps image downloading, resizing, memory and disk caching, and bitmap recycling into one simple and easy to use interface. By default, Glide includes an implementation for fetching images over http based on Google's Volley project for fast, parallelized network operations on Android.
Author: bumptech

Name: greenDAO
Short Description: greenDAO is a light & fast ORM solution for Android that maps objects to SQLite databases.
Author: greenrobot

Name: gson
Short Description: Gson is a Java library that can be used to convert Java Objects into their JSON representation. It can also be used to convert a JSON string to an equivalent Java object. Gson can work with arbitrary Java objects including pre-existing objects that you do not have source-code of.
Author: google

Name: InfiniteViewPager
Short Description: Augment Android's ViewPager with wrap-around functionality.
Author: antonyt

Name: ion
Short Description: Android Asynchronous Networking and Image Loading
Author: Koush

Name: Joda-Time
Short Description: Joda-Time provides a quality replacement for the Java date and time classes. The design allows for multiple calendar systems, while still providing a simple API. The 'default' calendar is the ISO8601 standard which is used by XML. The Gregorian, Julian, Buddhist, Coptic, Ethiopic and Islamic systems are also included, and we welcome further additions. Supporting classes include time zone, duration, format and parsing.
Author: JodaOrg

Name: KenBurnsView
Short Description: Android ImageViews animated by Ken Burns Effect
Author: flavioarfaria

Name: ListViewAnimations
Author: nhaarman

Name: Mirror
Short Description:
Mirror: Live previews of Android layouts


Code layouts in Eclipse or Android Studio*
Preview on real devices with Mirror, instantly
Save time, write better code
Author: Jimu Labs

Name: mortar
Short Description: Mortar eases the use of Dagger to divide Android apps into composable modules. It is not a framework: there are no abstract Application or Activity classes here. Mortar eschews magic. Rather, Mortar is a simple library that makes it easy to pair thin views with dedicated controllers (Presenters), isolated from most of the vagaries of the Activity life cycle.
Author: square

Name: Motion
Short Description: An Android library allowing images to exhibit a parallax effect. By replacing static pictures and backgrounds with a fluid images that reacts to screen tilt and orientation, Android applications can add a perceived depth and layering to their content. Motion works great for both full screen background images and smaller sized pictures to give users a whole new perspective on how they interact with their phone. This project was inspired in part by iOS 7's new parallax effect.
Author: nvanbenschoten

Name: OrmLite
Short Description: Object Relational Mapping Lite (ORM Lite) provides some lightweight functionality for persisting Java objects to SQL databases while avoiding the complexity and overhead of more standard ORM packages. It supports a number of SQL databases using JDBC and also supports Sqlite with native calls to Android OS database APIs.

Name: otto
Short Description:
Otto is an event bus designed to decouple different parts of your application while still allowing them to communicate efficiently.

Forked from Guava, Otto adds unique functionality to an already refined event bus as well as specializing it to the Android platform.
Author: square

Name: PanningView
Short Description: PanningView is a library which implements the animated background in the now playing screen of the Play Music app.
Author: flavienlaurent

Name: Photoview
Short Description: Implementation of ImageView for Android that supports zooming, by various touch gestures.
Author: chrisbanes

Name: poppyview
Short Description: Android library implementing a poppy view on scroll, similar to the one found in the Google Plus app
Author: flavienlaurent

Name: Retrofit
Short Description: Type-safe REST client for Android and Java.
Author: Square

Name: robotium
Short Description: Robotium is an Android test framework that has full support for WebViews, Activities, Dialogs, Toasts, Menus and Context Menus.
Author: RobotiumTech

Name: RoundedImageView
Short Description: a fast ImageView that supports rounded corners and ovals or circles
Author: vinc3m1

Name: scalpel
Short Description: A surgical debugging tool to uncover the layers under your app.
Author: JakeWharton

Name: segmented-control
Short Description:
This implementation is inspired by Segmented Controls for iOS.

A custom View for Android which is based on RadioGroup and RadioButton widget.
Author: hoang8f

Name: ShakeDetector
Short Description: This library provides a easy way to detect a shake movement using the build-in accelerometer and fire a callback on the UI thread every times it happens.
Author: tbouron

Name: Shimmer-android
Short Description: An Android TextView with a shimmering effect
Author: RomainPiel

Name: SlidingMenu
Short Description: SlidingMenu is an Open Source Android library that allows developers to easily create applications with sliding menus like those made popular in the Google+, YouTube, and Facebook apps.
Author: jfeinstein10

Name: SmoothProgressBar
Short Description: Small library allowing you to make a smooth indeterminate progress bar.
Author: castorflex

Name: Sprinkles
Short Description: Sprinkles is a boiler-plate-reduction-library for dealing with databases in android applications. Some would call it a kind of ORM but I don't see it that way. Sprinkles lets SQL do what it is good at, making complex queries. SQL however is a mess (in my opinion) when is comes to everything else. This is why sprinkles helps you with things such as inserting, updating, and destroying models. Sprinkles will also help you with the tedious task of unpacking a cursor into a model.
Author: emilsjolander

Name: StickyListHeaders
Short Description: StickyListHeaders is an Android library that makes it easy to integrate section headers in your ListView.
Author: emilsjolander

Name: Sugar
Short Description:
It is intended to simplify the interaction with SQLite database in Android.

It eliminates writing SQL queries to interact with SQLite db.
It takes care of creating your database.
It manages object relationships too.
It provides you with clear and simple APIs for db operations
Author: Satyan

Name: SuperToasts
Short Description: The SuperToasts library enhances and builds upon the Android Toast class. Some of the features of this library include context sensitive toasts (SuperActivityToasts), toasts with buttons and icons, non context sensitive toasts (SuperToasts), and a new style of toasts (SuperCardToasts) with many customization options for each.
Author: JohnPersano

Name: TimesSquare
Short Description: Standalone Android widget for picking a single date from a calendar view.
Author: square

Name: ViewPager
Short Description: An easy to use ViewPager that adds an awesome set of custom swiping animations. Just change your ViewPagers to JazzyViewPagers, two more steps, and you're good to go!
Author: jfeinstein10

Name: Volley
Short Description:
Volley is a library that makes networking for Android apps easier and most importantly, faster. We'll give an overview of how it works, common patterns that work well with it, and a walkthrough of how you can easily load thumbnail images for your ListView from the network in parallel.                     

https://developers.google.com/events/io/sessions/325304728
Author: google
